author: vargasa
body:
#### PR description:

`TrackerCommonData/data/Materials` package provides a script for building the categorization maps required for running `Validation/Geometry` module. This script was *a little bit* outdated (FORTRAN77) and here it is being rewritten to python3 with the same functionality (except the creation of `pdf` files, information which is now being printed directly on the console).

#### PR validation:

This update was proposed in a [Tracker DPG Meeting](https://indico.cern.ch/event/787654/contributions/3298998/attachments/1786295/2908498/Material_Budget_Categorization.pdf) and results in [the Material budget](https://indico.cern.ch/event/787656/contributions/3331625/attachments/1801554/2938673/FortranToPython_MaterialBudget.pdf) meeting. Validation was performed by comparing the output of pdf files and the new code. We'll keep the FORTRAN file until a full update of the documentation has been done.
title: TrackerCommonData: Categorization script update
